Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Initializes origin point for each object using the Point class. Origin default is set to coordinates 0,0. Origin can also be set by using input values from user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape()
      Creates a point object at 0,0 which is set to the private variable origin.
      Shape(int x, int y)
      Creates point object with values passed in.

      Calculates the distance between a Shape object and another Shape that is passed in

      Returns the coordinates of the origin

      Shifts the origin according to the deltaX and deltaY values
      void setOrigin(int x, int y)
      Sets the values entered by the user as the new origin coordinates

      Displays Shape information as a string

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • Shape

        public Shape()
        Creates a point object at 0,0 which is set to the private variable origin.

      • Shape

        public Shape(int x,
             int y)
        Creates point object with values passed in. Point is set to variable origin.
        Parameters:
        x - value enterd for x coordinate of origin
        y - value enterd for y coordinate of origin

    • Method Detail

      • setOrigin

        public void setOrigin(int x,
                      int y)
        Sets the values entered by the user as the new origin coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - entered value of x coordinate to be set to origin
        y - entered value of y coordinate to be set to origin

      • getOrigin

        public Point getOrigin()
        Returns the coordinates of the origin
        Returns:
        origin gives coordinates of the origin

      • move

        public void move(int deltaX,
                 int deltaY)
        Shifts the origin according to the deltaX and deltaY values
        Parameters:
        deltaX - value that the x coordinate of the origin will move by
        deltaY - value that the y coordinate of the origin will move by

      • distance

        public double distance(Shape other)
        Calculates the distance between a Shape object and another Shape that is passed in
        Parameters:
        other - shape that the distance is measured from
        Returns:
        distance the calculated distance between the object and the other object that is passed in
